creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: black body; two red flaps, blacked with white; each flap has metal button at top; one flap has green appliqued and embroidered monster-like figure; opposite flap has embroidered smiling face, with waving hand, looking over top of panel with fragments of image printed on paper (man with pink ball, chubby smiling baby)
medium: Cotton, printed paper, metal buttons, metallic thread; needlework
object_name: Shaman's Hat, from a two-piece set
title: Shaman's Hat, from a two-piece set
